entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
